name: Sylvan
author: Flint Sky
notes:
I actually had Gigaplant in a version I used earlier in the season but switched to Mind Scan and kept tweaking before settling with the deck I posted. Got frustrated coz I can't seem to get over the hump so I switched back to Heavy Starter, copying the Mind Scan deck I've been using. 

NOTE: Heavy Starter is not triggered by this deck.
